title: Eyewitness
description: SHADOW OF DOUBTA random encounter, a face in the crowd, had led Detective Doug MacDougal to the woman he'd been seeking for so long--barely one step ahead of a ruthless killer. And keeping both her and himself alive meant cultivating the fragile trust between a man haunted by a ten-year-old murder--and the unforgettable woman who was its only living witness....The past had finally caught up with Joy Donnelly-- and now this stranger wanted her to tell him the terrible secrets that had sent her into hiding. But how could she trust him? How could she even trust herself--when he made her feel things a woman on the run simply couldn't afford to feel?
author: Kathleen Creighton
